titlestmt.titleproper: Leiby family genealogical research materials undated
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

did.repository: The Historical Society of Pennsylvania 1300 Locust Street Philadelphia, PA 19107

bioghist.p: Johan Freidrich Leiby was born in Stiensfurth, Germany, and came to America on the ship Samuel in 1733. The family lived primarily in Berks and Lehigh Counties in Pennsylvania.

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of a lengthy genealogy titled "The Descendents of Johan Freidrich Leiby." The genealogy lists births, deaths and marriages for hundreds of family members, but does not include narrative details. There is also a copy of a Leiby Family Tree (last updated in November 2001) printed from Ancestry.com.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
